Text: Much thanks. Great album, great memories

It really is a shame to find a rare collection to see it's only been ripped in Joint Stereo, the very worst of the 3 MP3 formats and not actually real stereo at all.
The only way to get true stereo is with Dual Channel/Dual Stereo, this is the only seperate left and right channel format.

g8aso you are an ingrate. White_arcades has done us all a favour by uploading this album and all you can do is gripe about the fact that it isn't in the format you'd prefer.

Thank you white_arcades

hallo!!!
Ben jij maffia fan ga dan naar www.killing-cat.tk
Totally agree with you Howie, Thanks white arcades
Dont listen to g8aso, this is a fantastic collection from a guy pretty mcuh remembered for one Undertones track, but this proves he was so much more. Very grateful white_arcades, keep rocking!!
g8aso doesn't know what he's talking about with regard to the technical aspects of joint stereo.  Ignore him.
